Class ConfigurationWidget

  • BBjWidget
    • ConfigurationWidget

  • public class ConfigurationWidget
extends BBjWidget

    GridConfigurationWidget.bbj

    See Also:
    []

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigurationWidget(BBjWindow container!, BBjNumber id, BBjNumber x, BBjNumber y, IPersistentState statePersistable!, Boolean allowAdmin!)
      ConfigurationWidget(BBjWindow container!, BBjNumber id, BBjNumber x, BBjNumber y, IPersistentState statePersistable!, Boolean allowAdmin!, String realm!, String keyx!, IConfigurationsBC bc!)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and TypeMethod and Description
      voidadminButtonPush(BBjEvent ev!)

      onclick event for the admin button. toggles mode and image

      voidconfigsListEditSelect(BBjListSelectEvent ev!)

      event handler for config list edit selection disables the save button, fires change event and shows/unshows delete button if selected row did not change, do nothing

      voiddeleteButtonPush(BBjEvent ev!)

      event handler for delete button push deletes the currently selected configuration and selects the successor (or predecessor if last).

      voidfireConfigurationChangeEvent()

      notifies the state handler that a configuration has changed. the statehandler will then apply this new config to the component.

      StringgetKeyX()
      BBjNumbergetMinPaddingLeft()
      StringgetOnConfigurationChangeEventName()
      StringgetOnStateChangeEventName()
      StringgetRealm()
      ConfigurationStateHandlergetStateHandler()
      StringgetUserName()
      voidinit()

      initialisation method. will be called by the state handler. sets icons, callbacks and loads/applies the availlable configurations

      voidlistEditOptionsModify(BBjEvent ev!)

      Control validation for the list edit. Makes sure, setting name is saved after user typed it in the list edit Only when admin mode is enabled, user should be able to save default settings

      voidredraw(Boolean f_init!)

      @Override This method is called whenever the widget needs to be rendered

      voidsaveButtonPush(BBjEvent ev!)

      event handler for save button push

      voidsaveConfiguration()

      saves the configuration and refetches the configurations in the listEdit. also disables the save button.

      voidsetBC(IConfigurationsBC bc!)

      sets the bc and the userName from the bc and redraws, which triggers an init

      voidsetIconButtonAdminDisabled(String iconButtonAdminDisabled!)
      voidsetIconButtonAdminEnabled(String iconButtonAdminEnabled!)
      voidsetIconButtonDelete(String iconButtonDelete!)
      voidsetIconButtonSave(String iconButtonSave!)
      voidsetKeyX(String keyx!)
      voidsetMinPaddingLeft(BBjNumber minPaddingLeft)
      voidsetRealm(String realm!)
      voidsetStateHandler(ConfigurationStateHandler stateHandler!)

      sets the ConfigurationStateHandler to handle communication between the widget and the stateful component

      voidsetUserName(String userName!)

      sets the username in the widget and also in the bc depending if admin mode is enabled

      voidstateChange()

      defines what should happen when the state of the component changes. right now, the save button will enable

      voidtoggleDeleteButton(Boolean visible!)
      voidtoggleMenuDeleteButton(Boolean visible!)
      voidtoggleMenuSaveButton(Boolean visible!)
      voidtoggleSaveButton(Boolean visible!)

      • redraw

        public void redraw(Boolean f_init!)

        @Override This method is called whenever the widget needs to be rendered

        Parameters:
        Boolean f_init!: if TRUE the control is rendered for the first time so this method has to perform initial rendering
